actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain individuals to settle certain claims filed against the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to creditors of a named bank in full satisfaction of all claims against the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation for failing to disapprove a stock sale transaction which created financial losses for such creditors.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain individuals to settle certain claims filed against the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
